channel.title: Conference on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: security: Your complete guide to Microsoft experiences at RSAC™ 2026 Conference
item.description:
Microsoft announced its presence at the RSAC 2026 Conference and positioned its show-floor content around “Frontier Firms,” described as human-led and agent-operated organizations.

  • Source: Microsoft Security Blog

item.title: dotnet: Get Ready for .NET Conf 2025!
item.description:
Announcement: .NET Conf 2025 is scheduled for November 11–13, featuring .NET 10 and Visual Studio 2026, with a Student Zone on November 14.

  • Source: .NET
